name: resistible
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not pleasant, attractive, or strong and therefore easy to refuse, oppose, or avoid: He just didn't seem to understand that she found him completely resistible. The author's completely resistible prose style meant that I couldn't get past chapter five.
More examplesFewer examplesI found the prospect of spending the day accompanying them while they went shopping highly resistible.The invitation to join them on their camping trip was a very resistible one.Despite his extremely resistible appearance, he was excellent company.
